attributes.action: make Monday's an additional weekend day.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Working Mondays have been the downfull of Britain for years and need to be abolished. All work can be done in 4 days, the extra 5th day is unnecessary. 2 day weekends are far too short. With an additional day there will be more time to enjoy the money we have worked so hard for and, most of all, rest to be prepared to work hard for the rest of the week.
